plot: Richard Preston, possessing a little capital, decides to go west and invest it in a gold mine. Here he falls into the hands of two soldiers of fortune. They salt a worthless piece of land ...
title: The Salted Mine
plot_es: Richard Preston, possessing a little capital, decides to go west and invest it in a gold mine. Here he falls into the hands of two soldiers of fortune. They salt a worthless piece of land ...
